--- from_query.sql
FROM Singers
--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Query: &ast.FromQuery{
    From: &ast.From{
      From:   0,
      Source: &ast.TableName{
        Table: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 5,
          NameEnd: 12,
          Name:    "Singers",
        },
        Hint:   (*ast.Hint)(nil),
        As:     (*ast.AsAlias)(nil),
        Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
FROM Singers
